figure_1.title: Figure 1. Study selection process. HEAs, health equity audits.

claims.sentence: A flow diagram of the screening and selection process can be found in figure 1.

The included HEAs assessed various inequalities (including inequalities in ethnicity, gender, age, socioeconomic group and location) in service delivery, service access and health outcomes.16,19
